meanings.definition: A row of houses joined by common sidewalls.
meanings.sent1: The townhomes on Maple Street all look similar.
meanings.sent2: My friend lives in one of the townhomes at the end of the block.
meanings.sent3: The townhomes whispered secrets to each other through the shared walls.
meanings.sent4: The townhomes stood shoulder to shoulder like soldiers in formation.
meanings.sent5: I could hear the laughter from the townhomes as I walked by.

meanings.definition: A residential unit that shares a wall with another unit.
meanings.sent1: The townhomes in this neighborhood have cozy shared walls.
meanings.sent2: The townhomes are perfect for those who enjoy close-knit communities.
meanings.sent3: The townhomes play a game of telephone through the walls.
meanings.sent4: Living in the townhomes, you can almost feel your neighbor's heartbeat.
meanings.sent5: The townhomes create a sense of togetherness among residents.
